info.name: aa
info.description:
This specification defines the structure of the consulting model (Assessment, Recommendations, Corrective Actions, Observations, Technical Risks, Recommendation Installed Products, Recommendation Locations)

Contact Support:
 Name: Mohamed Abousteit
 Email: mohamed.abousteit@se.com

item.name: Retrieve assessments based on Site IDs

url.raw: {{baseUrl}}/assessments/search?sorting-by=reprehenderit ullamco ad est&sorting-order=reprehenderit ullamco ad est&page-size=reprehenderit ullamco ad est&page=reprehenderit ullamco ad est&reporting=reprehenderit ullamco ad est

query.description: Field on which the sorting is done (Default : locationName)
If true, then the response will be a count of assessment records

request.description: Fetch assessment information to show in a list view based on a list of Site Ids

response.name: OK

url.raw: {{baseUrl}}/assessments/search?sorting-by=reprehenderit ullamco ad est&sorting-order=reprehenderit ullamco ad est&page-size=reprehenderit ullamco ad est&page=reprehenderit ullamco ad est&reporting=reprehenderit ullamco ad est&API Key=<API Key>

 {

item.name: Retrieve recommendation list based on Assessment / Site

url.raw: {{baseUrl}}/recommendations/search?sorting-by=reprehenderit ullamco ad est&sorting-order=reprehenderit ullamco ad est&page-size=reprehenderit ullamco ad est&page=reprehenderit ullamco ad est&reporting=true&key-word=reprehenderit ullamco ad est&download=true

query.description: Field on which the sorting is done.
If true, then the response will be a count of recommendation by status and due date
If true, the response will be a detailed list of recommendation to download.

request.description: Retrieve list of recommendation in summary view

response.name: OK

url.raw: {{baseUrl}}/recommendations/search?sorting-by=reprehenderit ullamco ad est&sorting-order=reprehenderit ullamco ad est&page-size=reprehenderit ullamco ad est&page=reprehenderit ullamco ad est&reporting=true&key-word=reprehenderit ullamco ad est&download=true&API Key=<API Key>
